text: The 2019–20 season will be Kaposvári Rákóczi FC's 1st competitive season, 16th consecutive season in the OTP Bank Liga and 94th year in existence as a football club. ==First team squad== ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: Out: ===Winter=== In: Out: Source: ==Competitions== ===Overview=== ===Nemzeti Bajnokság I=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ===Matches=== ===Hungarian Cup=== ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== :Last updated on 27 June 2020. |- |colspan="14"|Players no longer at the club: |} ===Top scorers=== Includes all competitive matches.
